getProductList.description: Returns a list Product in natural order.

getMyLoyaltyCard.description: Get a loyalty card from Voucherify

getProductPageDetailsList.description: Returns a list ProductPageDetails in natural order.

getProductPagePoliciesList.description: Returns a list ProductPagePolicies in natural order.

first.description: Returns up to the first `n` elements from the list.

after.description: Returns the elements that come after the specified cursor.

last.description: Returns up to the last `n` elements from the list.

before.description: Returns the elements that come before the specified cursor.

reverse.description: Reverse the order of the underlying list.

sortKey.description: Sort the underlying list by the given key.

query.description:
Supported filter parameters:
 - `barcode`
 - `created_at`
 - `delivery_profile_id`
 - `error_feedback`
 - `gift_card`
 - `has_only_composites`
 - `has_only_default_variant`
 - `id`
 - `inventory_total`
 - `is_price_reduced`
 - `out_of_stock_somewhere`
 - `price`
 - `product_type`
 - `publishable_status`
 - `published_status`
 - `sku`
 - `status`
 - `tag`
 - `tag_not`
 - `title`
 - `updated_at`
 - `vendor`

See the detailed [search syntax](https://shopify.dev/api/usage/search-syntax)
for more information about using filters.

savedSearchId.description:
The ID of an existing saved search.
The search’s query string is used as the query argument.
Refer to [SavedSearch](https://shopify.dev/api/admin-graphql/latest/objects/savedsearch).

id.description: The ID of the Product to return.

input.description: The fields used to create a cart.

The profiles that you would like to remove from the list. 

Example:

{
  "emails":["george.washington@klaviyo.com","abraham.lincoln@klaviyo.com"],
  "phone_numbers":["+13239169023"],
  "push_tokens":["03df25c845d460bcdad7802d2vf6fc1dfde97283bf75cc993eb6dca835ea2e2r"]
}

first.description: Returns up to the first `n` elements from the list.

after.description: Returns the elements that come after the specified cursor.

last.description: Returns up to the last `n` elements from the list.

before.description: Returns the elements that come before the specified cursor.

reverse.description: Reverse the order of the underlying list.

sortKey.description: Sort the underlying list by the given key.

query.description:
Supported filter parameters:
 - `barcode`
 - `created_at`
 - `delivery_profile_id`
 - `error_feedback`
 - `gift_card`
 - `has_only_composites`
 - `has_only_default_variant`
 - `id`
 - `inventory_total`

See the detailed [search syntax](https://shopify.dev/api/usage/search-syntax)

savedSearchId.description:
The ID of an existing saved search.
The search’s query string is used as the query argument.
Refer to [SavedSearch](https://shopify.dev/api/admin-graphql/latest/objects/savedsearch).

id.description: The ID of the Product to return.

input.description: The fields used to create a customer access token.
The fields used to create a new customer.

email.description: The email address of the customer to recover.

updateProduct.description:
Update Product. If the input has Shopify values and a Shopify ID, the Shopify product with that ID is updated.
If the input has Shopify values and no Shopify ID, a Shopify product is created.

createProduct.description: Create Product. If Shopify values are provided, a Shopify product is also created and the new product ID is saved.

schema.description:
The profiles that you would like to remove from the list. 

Example:

{
  "emails":["george.washington@klaviyo.com","abraham.lincoln@klaviyo.com"],
  "phone_numbers":["+13239169023"],
  "push_tokens":["03df25c845d460bcdad7802d2vf6fc1dfde97283bf75cc993eb6dca835ea2e2r"]
}
The profiles that you would like to add to the list. Each object in the array must have an `email` or `phone_number`. You can also provide additional properties as key-value pairs.

recharge.description: The Recharge subscription data associated with this product
recharge.title: Recharge
